game.engine.stage.scene.object

Class ImageSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.stage.scene.object.SceneObject
      • game.engine.stage.scene.object.ImageSceneObject

  • public class ImageSceneObject
extends SceneObject
    A SceneObject that consists of an image. The default origin is set to Point(0,0). The size is set to the image's size. The image will be scaled to fit the size of this object.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        protected void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
         long elapsedTime)
        Description copied from class: SceneObject
        Paint this SceneObject. This method maybe called for collision testing with an elapsed time of zero. For correct collision the SceneObject it is important, that the object is drawn in it's actual state.
        Specified by:
        paint in class SceneObject
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics Object for painting
        elapsedTime - Elapsed time since the last call to this method

      • getOrigin

        public Point getOrigin()
        Description copied from class: SceneObject
        The origin of this SceneObject. This object's position will be translated to it's origin. The default implementation returns SceneObject.ORIGIN_TOP_LEFT
        Overrides:
        getOrigin in class SceneObject
        Returns:
        The origin of this ScreenObject
